txt.en: This rubble indicates instability in the structure of the hall ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
You cannot help but notice a great deal of rubble in this particular section of the Twenty-first Hall.\n\nYou should investigate to see just how filthy and polluted this once-great hall is.

You cannot help but notice a great deal of rubble in this particular section of the Twenty-first Hall.\n\nYou should investigate the rubble to see if the dwarves should be concerned for the stability of the ceiling.
Rubble can be found in the western part of the Twenty-first Hall.\n\nYou should examine the rubble that litters the floor.

The Twenty-first Hall appears to have a widespread issue of a crumbling ceiling.\n\nWhile no enemies lurk here, it is clear that there is much work yet to be done in order to make this hall livable once more.
Soot can be found on a number of surfaces in the western part of the Twenty-first Hall.\n\nYou should examine the soot that has built up over the years.
You have examined the rubble in the western sector of the Twenty-first Hall.
